Domestic Geese

fun facts

  1. Having tomia on their beak and tongue helps them to rip and pull roots, stems, grasses and aquatic plants from the ground.
  2. Ducks, geese and swans (Anatidae) all have a similar type of tomia which helps with holding and ripping vegetation.‚Äù
